text: Juan Antonio "Chi-Chi" Rodríguez (October 23, 1935 - August 8, 2024) was a Puerto Rican professional golfer. He was the first Puerto Rican to be inducted into the World Golf Hall of Fame. He was born in Rio Piedras, Puerto Rico. Rodríguez died on August 8, 2024, at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Profile at the World Golf Hall of Fame Category:1935 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Puerto Rico Category:Golfers Category:People from San Juan, Puerto Rico
title: Chi-Chi Rodríguez
